title: Video: Blood Orange – I’m Sorry We Lied
content:
The videos coming from Blood Orange’s debut LP, Coastal Grooves, have actually been pretty exciting considering it was an album that failed to set my world alight. Maybe they’re slowly winning me over? The Abteen Bagheri directed video for ‘I’m sorry we lied’ takes a film-noir aesthetic, mixes it with a healthy amount of California grime and then adds a splash of femme fatale to both allure and disgust. It’s a tale of attraction and betrayal that fits the dark yet catchy melodies of the track perfectly.

Blood Orange: I’m Sorry We Lied on Nowness.com.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
